scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && ns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && ns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios.aot: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && ns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && ns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android.aot: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && ns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run preparedemo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run preparedemo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../demo-ng && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.preparedemo: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo && ns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && ns install
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && ns plugin remove @codelab/nativescript-multi-select && ns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && ns install
scripts.preparedemo-vue: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-vue && ns plugin remove @codelab/nativescript-multi-select && ns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && ns install
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
